About

I'm Glenn, a self-employed Filipino front-end web developer from Vienna, Austria. I build websites and web applications for companies across the globe. I love working on great web designs and modern front-end web technologies focusing on performance and user experience.

I'm an alumnus of the University of Applied Science Technikum Wien, graduating with a Bachelor of Science in Engineering with a major in Information and Communication Systems and Services. I work on the Styria Digital Lab team focusing on generating ideas and creating innovative websites and applications. I'm part-time self-employed and I learn a lot from the open source community. In the past, I've built websites for clients such as ProSiebenSat.1, METRO GROUP, Volkswagen, 3i Group and more, at nexxar. I'm passionate about producing amazing websites and great applications, contributing on incredible open source technologies.

When I'm not coding or designing, I love to spend my time with my lovely wife Charmaine, my family and friends. I enjoy travelling around the world and discover cities and cultures. I'm an Apple and Nike enthusiast who loves to play the guitar and listen to JM Music.

If you have any questions or if you're interested on working together, feel free to email me. For more about me, you can also find me on Twitter and Github.

Expertise

Design

I produce modern web and UI design with simplicity and perfection, pixel for pixel. I provide consultancy on design concepts, to get the best out of your Corporate Identity and to distinguish your project from the competition.

Web Development

I develop interactive websites and applications progressively to provide great usability and user experience. I build valuable products, focusing on performance, scalability and maintainability.

Resposive Web Design

I create responsive websites in a mobile first approach to deliver an optimized layout and the best experience on any device.

Privacy Policy

Google Analytics

This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. (“Google”). Google Analytics uses “cookies”, which are text files placed on your computer, to help the website analyze how users use the site. The information generated by the cookie about your use of the website (including your IP address) will be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States.

In case of activation of the IP anonymization, Google will truncate/anonymize the last octet of the IP address for Member States of the European Union as well as for other parties to the Agreement on the European Economic Area. Only in exceptional cases, the full IP address is sent to and shortened by Google servers in the USA. On behalf of the website provider Google will use this information for the purpose of evaluating your use of the website, compiling reports on website activity for website operators and providing other services relating to website activity and internet usage to the website provider. Google will not associate your IP address with any other data held by Google. You may refuse the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings on your browser. However, please note that if you do this, you may not be able to use the full functionality of this website. Furthermore you can prevent Google’s collection and use of data (cookies and IP address) by downloading and installing the browser plug-in available under https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout?hl=en-GB.
